name: Downfall: Diary Of Dreams -THE TRIAL
description:
Downfall: Diary Of Dreams -THE TRIAL- is the demo of a game that's soon going to be fully released to the public.

Downfall is a game where you play as a little girl named Alice, she has trouble sleeping because of her constant weird dreams, you have to defeat those dreams by collecting diaries that are hidden in each respective dream, you have to do quests, go through lots of dialogue, and play through some mini-games after to get currency!!

(Downfall: Diary Of Dreams is currently unfinished, this is just the demo, if you wish to leave criticism on what i should change in the final game, you can DM me on Twitter!, my DM's are always open! ^-^)
